conv_purpose: User engages in a casual conversation to learn about and discuss different aspects of leading a healthy lifestyle.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User asks about general tips for maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
summarized prompts.explanation: This is the initial prompt where the user expresses interest in the topic of health by seeking general advice.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up the last round by asking for more details about how diet specifically impacts overall health.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt aligns with the 'follow-up' structure as the user builds on the previous response about healthy lifestyle tips by focusing on the role of diet.

conv_purpose: The user is exploring the nuances of digital technology, aiming to improve their understanding by refining the information they receive through casual conversation.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for a simple explanation of digital photography.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the conversation on the topic of digital technology, specifically focusing on digital photography, setting a base for further discourse in the subsequent rounds.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the request for a simple explanation by asking for a more detailed description, focusing on the technical aspects of digital photography to deepen their understanding.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user revises the initial request by adjusting the level of detail they seek, aligning with the 'revision' structure where specific changes are made to the constraints of the prompt without altering the topic.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the previously detailed request by asking for real-world applications and examples in the context of digital photography to connect theory with practice.
summarized prompts.explanation: In this round, the user further revises the previous requirements, specifying the need for practical examples, which follows the 'revision' structure by making a specific change to enrich the understanding of the discussed topic.

conv_purpose: The user wants to understand more about personal finance, particularly focusing on tips for managing finances efficiently.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for general advice on how to manage personal finances effectively.
summarized prompts.explanation: In the first round, the user sets the stage by requesting broad guidance on personal finance management without any specific constraints.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the tone in the last round's prompt to make the response more detailed by requesting examples of budgeting strategies.
summarized prompts.explanation: This reflects the 'revision' structure as the user refines their initial broad request by specifying a need for examples, enhancing the detail and practicality of the information.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by inquiring about how these budgeting strategies can be adapted for someone saving for a large purchase.
summarized prompts.explanation: This represents a 'follow-up' structure as the user builds on the information previously provided, adding a specific context to better understand how the advice can be applied.

conv_purpose: The user is interested in finding fashion advice for a casual setting, trying to refine the guidance through progressive clarification.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for advice on how to style a casual outfit that would be suitable for a weekend outing.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user's initial prompt sets the context and purpose of the conversation, seeking guidance on a specific fashion topic.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the request by asking for suggestions that exclude the use of denim, aiming for a more unique style.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user introduces a revision by refining the constraints, excluding denim to receive more tailored advice on the casual outfit.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user further revises the criteria by requesting options that incorporate more vibrant colors to add flair to the outfit.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user adds another revision, changing the criterion to include vibrant colors, ensuring the fashion advice aligns more closely with their personal style preferences.

conv_purpose: User seeks to improve their fitness by discussing and refining a flexible exercise routine to fit around their busy schedule.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for suggestions on creating a simple exercise routine that can be done at home without any equipment.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the dialogue by establishing the user's intent and setting basic constraints on the exercise routine.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the requirement for the suggested routine to include exercises that can be completed in 20 minutes, aiming to make the routine more time-efficient.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user revises the original constraint of the exercise routine duration to make it more time-efficient, aligning with the 'Revision' structure.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user further modifies the requirement to include exercises that focus on both strength and flexibility.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user revises the constraints again, this time to include a focus on both strength and flexibility exercises, demonstrating another layer of refinement in the 'Revision' structure.

conv_purpose: User wants to gather and refine information about different music genres and their features through a casual conversation.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for a broad overview of popular music genres and their defining characteristics.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt serves as the starting point for the conversation, asking for general information without specific constraints, fitting the casual chat style.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modify the depth of discussion in last round's prompt to include more detailed descriptions of each genre's origins for a deeper understanding.
summarized prompts.explanation: This round reflects the 'revision' structure by changing the depth of the information requested, without altering the overall topic, to gain more insights.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the content discussed in the previous rounds to capture a cohesive overview of the music genres and their origins.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt requires synthesizing information from multiple rounds, consistent with the 'summary' structure by creating a holistic overview of previous discussions.

conv_purpose: The user explores various psychological theories and their impact on mental health in a casual, conversational manner.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user initiates a conversation by asking for an overview of a popular psychological theory, such as cognitive behavioral therapy, and its main principles.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt introduces the main topic of discussion and sets the stage for a follow-up inquiry by asking for foundational information about cognitive behavioral therapy.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up by asking how the principles of cognitive behavioral therapy can be applied to manage anxiety in daily life.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt reflects the 'follow-up' structure as it builds directly on the overview given about cognitive behavioral therapy, seeking to understand practical applications of the theory discussed in the previous round.

conv_purpose: User engages in a casual conversation about their favorite entertainment activities, exploring various preferences and experiences.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User initiates the conversation by asking for recommendations about popular TV shows to watch in their free time.
summarized prompts.explanation: The initial prompt sets the foundation for a casual chat about entertainment preferences, aligning with the topic without a specific task objective.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by asking for more details about one of the recommended TV shows, such as its genre or main storyline.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt follows up on the previous recommendation, introducing a new constraint by requesting specific details about the TV show.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user recalls a previous conversation about movies they enjoyed and compares it with the TV show discussed, asking for similarities.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt acts as a callback, linking past discussions about movies to the current topic of TV shows, providing context for the comparison.

conv_purpose: The user aims to explore and discuss various aspects of music, seeking insights and clarifications through a casual chat.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User asks about the influence of classical music on modern genres.
summarized prompts.explanation: This is the starting prompt, where the user sets the topic for discussion by directly asking about classical music's impact.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the question to focus on the specific ways classical music has impacted modern rock music, seeking a more tailored understanding.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'Revision' structure as the user specifies the inquiry to narrow the focus onto rock music, altering the previous broad inquiry about modern genres.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user recalls the influence of classical music on modern genres discussed in the first round and seeks examples of specific classical composers whose work is evident in today's music.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'Callback' structure since the user refers back to the main topic introduced in c1 about the influence of classical music to explore it further with examples.
